Opal.Description:
Swirling iridescent colors mesmerize in this amazing
specimen of Opal.

Emerald.Description:
The deepest green with a slight hue of blue, this is
definitely a gemstone for the king!

Ruby.Description:
Blood red and seaming to shine with a light of its own,
it's so pretty maybe the King won't miss if it isn't returned!

Sapphire.Description:
The very definition of blue, this sapphire draws the eye
with a radiance rivaled by few other gemstones.

Diamond.Description:
It's just carbon, but damn that's some sexy carbon.
The king of all gemstones, if there was one item you'd covet
from this quest, wow this is it!

Pearl.Description:
Ok, technically not a gemstone but who are you to
correct the king. Still for oyster snot, this is a pretty
amazing piece of work. As iridescent and lustrous as any
of the other gems.

Dagger.Description:
Basically a smallish knife with edges on both sides
of the blade. Easy to wield with one hand.

Club.Description:
Solid wood, smaller at the holding end, bigger at the
business end, you know, a club!

Bow.Description:
Curved wood about an arms width in length with a taut
sinew cord. This weapon can do some serious ranged damage.

Short Sword.Description:
A one-handed weapon best for quick stabbing damage. Much
better than a dagger but still a close in weapon.

Lance.Description:
A long wooden pole with a pointy bit at one end. Place
the pointy bit in your enemy and you win! Although not the most
powerful weapon, it's pretty close.

Crossbow.Description:
A ranged weapon with enormous stopping power. Compact
and shooting a metal tipped wooden bolt, this is the most
powerful weapon you can yield.

Leg Bone.Description:
It's exactly what it sounds like. Mostly bone, a few
bits of sinew. But hey, at least it's dry. In a pinch you could
use it as a weapon, better than your fists, but not by much.

Potion.Description:
Reddish liquid that looks like a fine pinot noir, but
smells like south end of a north bound donkey. But it looks like
it has tremendous restorative powers.

Apple.Description:
Red and delicious, natures wonder. It may even make
you a little bit healthier.

Old Shoe.Description:
No not a pair of shoes, just one. And it's seen much
better days. It looks like someone walked right out of it and
just kept on walking. That is one disintegrating shoe.

Wooden Crate.Description:
If you have things you need shipped on the next ship to
wherever, this could be the ticket. Sturdy wood, metal
wrapped corners. As far as crates go, this is a masterpiece.

Silver Shilling.Description:
Shiny and silver, it's more than a pence, and a long
way from a pound, but it's still nice to find free money!

5 Vellum Sheets.Description:
The finest calfskin parchment, so precious and rare.
This would be the perfect medium to capture your epic adventure.
If you live through it perhaps you can find a scribe to
write it all down!
